previous row chain 5 turn ◦ row e9 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e10 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn ◦ row e11 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e12 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn ◦ row e13 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e14 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn ◦ 9 row e15 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e16 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 5 turn ◦ row e17 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn until now this has been the usual way of adding a new flower at this point flower e should have one petal with no slip stitches one petal with precisely one slip_stitch and four petals with two slip stitches each row e18 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the only remaining ◦ marked chain that is the middle turning chain from row b6 chain 2 turn remove marker ◦ row e19 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e20 now you ll use flower a the first flower you ever worked into as the new flower work 4 double_crochet into ◦ the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the closer petal of flower a chain 2 turn row e21 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the same petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn row e22 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower a chain ◦ 2 turn at this point all petals of a are full they have two slip stitches each row e23 work 4 double_crochet into the double crochets of the previous row chain 2 slip_stitch into the next petal of flower e chain ◦ 2 turn at
